recurring_frequency_valid.name: recurring_frequency_valid
recurring_frequency_valid.value: recurring_frequency IS NULL OR recurring_frequency IN ('monthly', 'quarterly', 'yearly')

export_format_valid.name: export_format_valid
export_format_valid.value: export_format IS NULL OR export_format IN ('pdf', 'excel', 'csv')

schedule_frequency_valid.name: schedule_frequency_valid
schedule_frequency_valid.value: schedule_frequency IS NULL OR schedule_frequency IN ('weekly', 'monthly', 'quarterly')

feedback_score_valid.name: feedback_score_valid
feedback_score_valid.value: feedback_score IS NULL OR (feedback_score >= 1 AND feedback_score <= 5)

filing_frequency_valid.name: filing_frequency_valid
filing_frequency_valid.value: filing_frequency IS NULL OR filing_frequency IN ('monthly', 'quarterly', 'yearly')

rates_valid.name: rates_valid
rates_valid.value: open_rate >= 0 AND click_rate >= 0 AND conversion_rate >= 0 AND booking_rate >= 0

confidence_level_valid.name: confidence_level_valid
confidence_level_valid.value: confidence_level IS NULL OR confidence_level IN (90, 95, 99)

statistical_significance_valid.name: statistical_significance_valid
statistical_significance_valid.value: statistical_significance IS NULL OR (statistical_significance >= 0 AND statistical_significance <= 1)

p_value_valid.name: p_value_valid
p_value_valid.value: p_value IS NULL OR (p_value >= 0 AND p_value <= 1)
